company_profile.firm_description: A leading Kenyan law firm providing a wide range of legal services to our clients. Each year, several national and international corporations, public sector organizations, non-profit organisations, international organizations, and individuals rely on our legal acumen and professional experience.

founding_partners.title: Founding Partner
founding_partners.qualifications: Fellow of the UK Chartered Institute of Arbitrators (FCIArb)

government_positions.description: Assisted and supported the Attorney General of Kenya to execute the duties of being the Principal Legal Advisor for the Government
Serving under His Excellency William Samoei Ruto

international_experience: United Nations International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda (ICTR) - 1997-2006

firm_history.merger_description: The Firm is a product of a merger between Ogetto and Company Advocates, and Omwega, Omanwa and Company Advocates
firm_history.pioneering_role: Both founding partners played a pioneering role for Kenyan lawyers in international criminal courts by appearing to represent accused persons before the United Nations International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda (ICTR) in 1997-2006

company_profile.vision: To be a provider of 'Legal services you can trust'
company_profile.mission: To provide clients with prompt, practical and cost-effective legal services to simultaneously maximize opportunities and minimize legal risks arising from an ever-changing policy, legal, regulatory and institutional landscape, both domestically and internationally

methodology: Employ high calibre staff while ensuring they continually update their skills through training in their chosen areas of practice
Assign work to qualified, competent and experienced lawyers with a partner maintaining overall oversight
Study and understand the client's goals, evaluate these against the law and suggest and offer practical and effective solutions
Establish and agree on clear communication procedures that speed up decision making and delivery of services
Regularly request, evaluate and respond promptly and positively to clients' feedback
